name: atingsdb
title: Ratingsdb
description: Seemlessly search movie and tv show ratings and find where you can watch them!
author: krod12

preferences.name: omdbToken
preferences.title: OMDb API Token
preferences.description: Register for a free token at https://omdbapi.com/
preferences.placeholder: Please enter your API token here

preferences.name: watchModeApiKey
preferences.title: Watch Mode API Key
preferences.description: Register for a free token at https://api.watchmode.com
preferences.placeholder: Please enter your API key here

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
